name: Morning Coffee (Daverinoe)
description:
A short experience about the joys of coffee. 

Enjoy all parts of coffee brewing!

From refilling the water to emptying the bones.

And please don't forget to enjoy your...

Best enjoyed downloaded.

Trigger warnings: Themes of self-harm and suicide.

A game for the Godot Wild Jam #54!

Made with Godot Engine

Music courtesy of Sarah Platt!

Logo by Lavie!

Most 3D models from Fertile Soil Productions

Additional sound effects bought from packs with appropriate licenses.

Day Panorama from Open Footage

Textures from 3D Textures

Liquid shader from GDQuest
